attributes.action: Hold a referendum as to whether the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland should remain part of the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No referendum has ever been held as to whether the UK should retain its membership in the EU. We believe it is time for the Prime Minister to consider the opinion of the masses as well as the economic, cultural, military and legislative implications of our continued membership of the EU.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Hold a referendum as to whether the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland should remain part of the European Union"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14540.asp

Prime Minister's Office
